import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiMercadoLivreService } from '../services/api-mercado-livre.service'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { Item } from '../models/itens'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu', templateUrl: './menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu.component.css'] }) export class MenuComponent implements OnInit { inputValue: string = ''; itens: Item[] = []; constructor(private apiML: ApiMercadoLivreService) {} onInputChanged(event: Event): void { this.inputValue = (event.target as HTMLInputElement).value; } ngOnInit(): void { this.searchItens(); } searchItens(): void { if (this.inputValue.trim() === '') { return; } this.apiML.getItens(this.inputValue).subscribe( (result) => { this.itens = result; }, (error) => { console.log(error); } ); } }
